string.text: Hide and Seek: Escape from Powerful Emission
Escape from powerful emission in the dungeons of Bar 100 X-Ray
Refuge: Do not cripple Borland
Don't poke Borland, stick together
Talk to Malandrinus
Speak to Malandrinus at Bar 100 X-Ray
New Details: Speak to Malandrinus
Speak to Malandrinus to get useful information.
New details: Talk to Borland
Talk to Borland, tell him new details about the artifact, and get him to cooperate with Malandrinus.
Waiting: Waiting for a signal from Malandrinus.
In two days, you must give Malandrinus an answer, agreeing to cooperate.
Waiting: Speak to Malandrinus
Agree to collaborate
Cooperation: Speak to Captain Ivantsov.
Speak to Captain Ivantsov, Dutya leader, to ask him for information.
Cooperation: help Captain Ivantsov
Help Captain Ivantsov, the Duty leader, by finishing his shift at the roadblock.
Cooperation: Talk to Malandrinus
Talk to Malandrinus
Dangerous Duty: Waiting for your shift.
Waiting for your shift, which will start at 18:00 hours.
Dangerous duty: Talk to the watch commander
Talk to the watch commander, get instructions.
Dangerous duty: Protect the area
Repulse mutant attack at all costs.
Swamp House: Find a home in the swamp
Find House in the Swamp in the Foggy Forest
Home in the Fens: Speak to the Hermit
Speak to the Hermit to find the way down to the lab.
House in the Fens: Find Artifact
Try to find an artifact.
Home in the Swamp: Kill the Madman
The hermit has finally gone mad, you need to take him out.
Home in the Fens: Search the Recluse's dead body
Search the hermit's corpse, find the key.
Descent into the Laboratory: Find the entrance to the Laboratory
Find Laboratory entrance x14
Arena: Speak to the Bone Thrower
Speak to the arena master Gutbuster about arena fights.
Arena: Surrender gear
Surrender your arena equipment and trophies to the Stallion.
Arena: Enter the Arena
Enter the arena for another fight
Arena: Arrange Combat
To arrange a fight with a partner
Arena: To arrange a fight
Agree to Fight with a Combat Partner
Arena: Retrieve your equipment
Retrieve their equipment from the safe
Arena: Get Combat Reward
Gain a Fighting Reward from Calgan
Special Training: Get EMP training

Markov tells you about the current situation due to the mysterious disappearances of stalkers. According to the plan developed to counter the unknown group of extremists, take a special training course from the radio operators.
Special Training: Return to the Dhole Mechanic
The general skill training course in the REB specialty has been completed. You will now be able to assist the Dahlgovs in a special operation to identify and eliminate the troublemakers.
Bait: Measure the radio signal from the first station
Head to the abandoned hangar and take the necessary measurements at the specified point.
Decoy: Get a reading from second radio station
Follow to second station.
Decoy: Get a reading from the third station
Record the data from the instrument at the extreme point.
Decoy: Deal with the ambush.
Suddenly you are surrounded by a group of mercenaries. Destroy it.
Bait: Follow to the customer.
Return to Markov and inform him of what happened.
Narrow your search: Discuss the situation with the leader of the group of purebreds.
We managed to establish that the mercenaries who attacked you were seen in the company of a purebred. Find Vitalik and tell him about the involvement of one of his men in the sabotage.
Narrow your search: Take the first point to transmit a false message
Go to the Misty Forest to transmit a signal to the southern groups of Puritybots.
Narrowing your search: Send a false message to the Puritybots
You need to narrow down your search for a possible traitor by sending a few false messages to the airwaves.
Narrowing your search: Occupy the second point to send a false message
Go to the Bar to transmit a signal to the northern groups of the Czystonebians.
Narrowing your search: Send a false message to the Cleaners
You need to narrow down your search for a possible traitor by sending a few false messages to the airwaves.
Narrowing your search: Follow up with Vitalik.
Report to Vitalik that you aired false messages and managed to narrow down your search for agents of extremist groups among the squads of the purebreds.
Assembly: Follow to the procurer
Go to the main Dolgian procurer for the necessary radio parts and other components to build wiretap bugs.
Assembly: Go back to Markov.
Pick up a special soldering station for bugging from Markov.
Assembly: Execute the bug assembly
Apply the personal soldering station and build special bugs of the wiretaps.
Assemble: Follow to Vitalik's
Talk to Vitalik about further plan of action.
Decoupling: Go to the junkyard.
Need to find out who exactly the agent amongst the Puritybugs. Follow them to their checkpoint at the junkyard and pass the disguised transmitters along with the order from Vitalik.
Decoupling: Check the radio signals
Carry out a check on the signals received from the bugs.
Decoupling: Eliminate the group of unidentified men who emanated the beacon signal
Eliminate those who have been picked up by the bugs.
Disconnect: Return to the bar.
Follow to Markov and report to him on the successful completion of the mission.
Disconnect: Eliminate the group of unidentified men from which the beacon signal is emanating
Eliminate those who were able to be detected by the wiretaps.
Disconnect: Return to the bar.
Follow to Markov and report to him on the successful completion of the mission.
Find for Turner %s
You need to bring tools to the Turner so he can upgrade his gear.

You know, bro, I'm actually a pretty good technician. I can fix your weapons and armor, and I can even do some upgrades, you know? Or rather, I would do them if I had proper tools. But where to get them here? Maybe you could help me get a simple kit, huh?
I need a tool kit for rough work. It's got to have tools and oils for working with guns. If you can get me one, I'd appreciate it, even pay you. I guess.
All right, man! Oh, I'm sorry, I can't pay you. But I can give you a good discount!
Find for the Lathe %s
You need to get the Turner some tools for fine craftsmanship. He needs a more complete set in order to do more complex gear upgrades.
Hey man, if you agree to get me a more complete set, you'll get an even bigger discount. Can you help me out, buddy?
I need tools to do some fine work. Should have everything I need in there. You'd be like a brother to me if you got it!

Wow, man, thanks, bro! Now I'm gonna be rich for sure. Damn it, I'm gonna be successful... Unless, of course, I miss this chance. But for now, I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, mate.
Find for the Lathe %s.
We need to get the Turner %s. He needs a unique kit to do even more sophisticated gear upgrades.
Hey, man, if you find something good, I'll give you a discount.
I need calibration tools. They should have everything I need. You'll be like a brother to me if you get them!

No hoo...! Damn, thanks, bro! Now I'm gonna be rich for sure. Goddamn it, I'm gonna be successful... Unless, of course, I miss this chance. But I can't offer you anything better than a discount. Sorry, buddy.
